    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings(java.lang.String appId)
        Initializes a settings object with the given app id.
        Parameters:
        appId - A valid app id retrieved from the Sempro web portal.

      • Settings

        public Settings(java.lang.String appId,
                java.lang.String authCode)
        Initializes a Settings instance with the given app id and auth code
        Parameters:
        appId - A valid app id retrieved from the Sempro web portal.
        authCode - A valid auth code retrieved from the Sempro API to authenticate as an existing user

    • Method Detail

      • getAppId

        public java.lang.String getAppId()
        The app id corresponding to your application.

        App ids are issued on the Sempro web portal. This value may only be set once, and must be set at init time.

        Returns:
        The app id

      • getAuthCode

        public java.lang.String getAuthCode()
        The auth code being used to authenticate as an existing user.

        An auth code can be retrieved from the Sempro API. This value may only be set once, and must be set at init time.

        Returns:
        The auth code

      • isFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled

        public boolean isFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled()
        A boolean property that indicates whether Sempro should manage the Firebase Cloud Messaging registration.

        The default value is true.

        Returns:
        Is Firebase Cloud Messaging auto registration enabled

      • setFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled

        public void setFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled(boolean firebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled)
        A boolean property that indicates whether Sempro should manage the Firebase Cloud Messaging registration.

        The default value is true.

        Parameters:
        firebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled - Is Firebase Cloud Messaging auto registration enabled

      • getFileProviderAuthorities

        public java.lang.String getFileProviderAuthorities()
        A String that signifies which authority Sempro will use to provide files to the CAMERA application.

        This need only be set when you have a provider defined in the AndroidManifest.

        Returns:
        The authorities string.

      • setFileProviderAuthorities

        public void setFileProviderAuthorities(java.lang.String fileProviderAuthorities)
        A String that signifies which authority Sempro will use to provide files to the CAMERA application.

        This need only be set when you have a provider defined in the AndroidManifest.

        Parameters:
        fileProviderAuthorities - The authorities string set in your provider tag

      • getMapsApiKey

        public java.lang.String getMapsApiKey()
        Google Maps API key to use to display a location preview for Location messages. If null or empty, a text representation of the location is shown instead.
        Returns:
        mapsApiKey Google Maps API key

      • setMapsApiKey

        public void setMapsApiKey(java.lang.String mapsApiKey)
        Google Maps API key to use to display a location preview for Location messages. If null or empty, a text representation of the location is shown instead.
        Parameters:
        mapsApiKey - Google Maps API key

      • getServiceBaseUrl

        public java.lang.String getServiceBaseUrl()

      • setServiceBaseUrl

        public void setServiceBaseUrl(java.lang.String serviceBaseUrl)

      • getRegion

        public java.lang.String getRegion()
        A String that determines which region to connect to.
        Returns:
        The region identifier

      • setRegion

        public void setRegion(java.lang.String region)
        A String that determines which region to connect to.

        Leave unspecified to use the default region (US). Set to "eu-1" to use the EU region.

        Parameters:
        region - The region identifier

      • getAuthenticationDelegate

        public AuthenticationDelegate getAuthenticationDelegate()

      • setAuthenticationDelegate

        public void setAuthenticationDelegate(AuthenticationDelegate authenticationDelegate)
